title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: langchain-ai/langchain
summary: LangChain’s Ollama integration lets you call local models through the Ollama REST API in any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; generate, chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now named Open WebUI); supports RAG, multi-user, model manager, plugins.

title: oterm
summary: Terminal UI client for Ollama written in Python; chat, save/load sessions, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama; use local LLMs as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; Kotlin friendly, Spring Boot starters available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama; simple DSL to chat, generate and pull models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with readline, conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images and docker-compose examples for CPU/GPU inference.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and ingress.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama REST API; GenServer-based client with streaming and telemetry.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama; async/await, static binaries, easy to embed in desktop apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ and Unity.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama; chat and generate text locally in mobile/desktop apps.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama; zero-dependency HTTP, cross-compile friendly.

title: ollama-r
summary: R wrapper for Ollama; install via r-universe, chat and embed inside R notebooks.
